snippet: KAMIYA--Smile, died peacefully on Sunday, May 29th in Sunnyvale, California. He was 95 years old. He was born and died in California, but considered New York City his home. He lived there for over 60 years raising his family and working as a public accountant at his firm Kamiya & Sklar. We will miss his generous heart and dry humor. Smile is preceded in death by his wife, Emi. He is survived by his son, Akira, daughter, Sumi (Ken), and five grandchildren, Koyama, Yuta, Emiko, Miles and Maya. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAMIYA--Smile, died peacefully on Sunday, May 29th in Sunnyvale, California. He was 95 years old. He was born and died in California, but considered New York City his home. Smile is preceded in death by his wife, Emi. He is survived by his son, Akira, daughter, Sumi (Ken), and five grandchildren, Koyama, Yuta, Emiko, Miles and Maya. 1/3
